RelatedSentence: Lake Dillon Fire-Rescue and Summit County Senior Services have been selected to participate in a training conference on fire- and fall - prevention sponsored by the National Fire Protection Association .

Lake Dillon Fire-Rescue and Summit County Senior Services have been selected to participate in a training conference on fire- and fall - prevention sponsored by the National Fire Protection Association .
The two local agencies were among teams from 30 communities across the United States and Canada selected to participate in the event , according to a Lake Dillon Fire-Rescue news release .
Following the conference , Lake Dillon Fire will conduct a minimum of five group presentations and at least two train-the-trainer sessions for Summit County Senior Services .
Summit County Senior Services will integrate materials from the Remembering When program into its outreach through home visits , the release stated .
The Remembering When program targets a wide age range of older adults , said Karen Berard - Reed , senior project manager for the National Fire Protection Association , in the release .

The Remembering When program has been implemented in communities throughout North America since 1999 to help thousands of older adults learn strategies to help them live safely at home , the release stated .
